communityDescription: GDG is an independent group; our activities and the opinions expressed here should in no way be linked to Google, the corporation.

description.short: Ignite Your Development Journey by Google Developer Group. Join a global community of developers for a day of inspiration, learning, and connection. Dive deep into the latest technologies, experiment with cutting-edge tools, and network with like-minded peers.
description.long: Ignite Your Development Journey by Google Developer Group. Join a global community of developers for a day of inspiration, learning, and connection. Dive deep into the latest technologies, experiment with cutting-edge tools, and network with like-minded peers.

whatToExpect.title: Networking Opportunities
whatToExpect.description: Connect with like-minded developers, industry leaders, and Google experts to expand your professional network and collaborate on projects.

whatToExpect.title: Career Guidance
whatToExpect.description: Get advice from industry professionals and Google experts on how to advance your career in tech, including resume reviews, interview tips, and career paths.

whatToExpect.title: Community Engagement
whatToExpect.description: Engage with the vibrant Google Developer Groups community, participate in interactive sessions, and explore ways to contribute to open-source projects.

pastDevFest.summery: DevFest 2023, a premier tech event organized by GDG Durgapur, united developers, tech enthusiasts, and industry experts for a day of knowledge sharing and networking. The event featured insightful sessions on cutting-edge technologies, interactive workshops, and hands-on coding activities. Participants had the opportunity to explore topics like AI, cloud computing, and web development. DevFest 2023 fostered a vibrant community and inspired developers to innovate, collaborate, and grow within the dynamic tech ecosystem.
